column2: Forged in the heart of Valyria, this mace is made entirely of Valyrian Steel, the rarest metal in Essos and Westeros. Worth a King's ransom, rumors tell that Valyria contains bountiful amounts of these kinds of mighty weapons.

Personally forged by Tristifer in his youth. The colossal war hammer dwarfs all other weapons on the battlefield. Only a handful of men are strong enough to wield the hammer in battle. It is mainly used for ceremonial occasions such as executions and coronations.
Lady Forlorn is the ancestral valyrian steel longsword of House Corbray. It has a heart-shaped ruby in its pommel.
Vigilance is a Valyrian steel longsword belonging to House Hightower.

According to legend, Samwell 'Starsmith' the founder of House Dayne tracked a falling star to the mouth of the Torentine, and Starfall was then constructed where a magical stone was discovered. The greatsword Dawn was forged from the heart of this fallen star.

According to legend, Samwell 'Starsmith' the founder of House Dayne tracked a falling star to the mouth of the Torentine, and Starfall was then constructed where a magical stone was discovered. The greatsword Dawn was forged from the heart of this fallen star. Only the greatest warriors of House Dayne can wield this greatsword. Once a warrior claims this sword he becomes 'The Sword Of the Morning'.
Three must be true: Brave, Kind, Patient, Quick, Just, Diligent, Honourable, Ambitious, Bleeding Heart, Huge, Tall, Strong.
A relic of the ancient Valyrian god Balerion.
An ornate amulet forged and crafted in the heart of Valyria.
A painting personally painted by the finest artists in the Freehold.
Sculpted by only the finest artists in the heart of the Freehold.
A fine pair of robes worn by the Lord Freeholders of the Valyrian peninsula.
Forged with dragonfire in the heart of Valyria. This sword was once wielded by a Valyrian warlord hundreds of years ago.
A sculpture of the founder of the modern Valyrian Freehold. Handcrafted by only the finest artists in the heart of the Valyria.
An ancient Valyrian bracelet created hundreds of years ago.
Forged with dragonflame at an unknown date. This spear is nearly indestructible and has claimed the lives of many great men.
A lance made entirely of Valyrian Steel. Quite the prize.
Made by the finest craftsmen in Valyria this crossbow has felled many humans and beasts.
A sculpture of an ancient Valyrian Archon.
An ancient tapestry worth a king's ransom.
This tapestry depicts the conquests of Pomporius during the 1st Valyrian Civil War. A beauty to behold.
A set of thick leather armor..
A set of leather armor reinforced by the addition of ringmail.
A set of very heavy chained mail.
A set of impressive armor usually worn by knights.
A set of cheap but flashy golden armor.
A sword for avenging lost people of your faith.
A sword slightly longer than a dagger.
